documents.document: I'm missing some clothes, at least three pairs of pants, and it's frustrating the hell out of me. I've looked everywhere at home at 3am.
I liked a @YouTube video https://t.co/85WBfY7Iks Waxing Presidential With The Late Show Road Show
I liked a @YouTube video https://t.co/VARPkyCwwd The Tonight Show Starring Johnny Carson: 06/07/1977...Tom Snyder
Ever feel tired, but can't sleep?
I hope with the upcoming snow in Vancouver, Christmas comes with it.
I think if you're over 13, one should comport themselves knowing that wrestling isn't real.
On the cab to work, I spotted a local TV anchor walking on Main street. They're not as tall as they appear on television.
@chrisgailus Were you on GDNY when Jim Ryan and that reporter started arguing on the air?
I tend to think the stakes are different, so perhaps one can vote yes one time & another no. Then again, it can also be political.
Is it a legitimate point to say, because a senator confirmed a judge for a lower court, they ought to do the same for a higher court?
Here's my interview with Tim Carlson of @Conspiracy_Now on Foreign Radical opening Monday at Studio 1398: https://t.co/hxvfOh5gIH
What's with all the Yiddish Ryan Gosling uses in La La Land?
I talk to @Conspiracy_Now's Tim Carlson about Foreign Radical opening Monday at Studio 1398: https://t.co/hxvfOgNFk7
Here's an old Webster! from 1982 that includes @RafeMair & @GordieHogg: https://t.co/EnhIIQQZtw #bcpoli
Happy birthday to @LizSmth.
Gee, it's cold out, eh?
@JillKrop Why don't the @GlobalBC reporters say which city they're in when they say "Global News." The guy in Kelowna does.
I thought after the age of 11, people weren't supposed to eat chicken strips. Well, I did but they were from Juke.
I think Trump wanted a hug. https://t.co/ezQnZnbV4U
@theArtsClub I emailed about arranging an interview regarding the Audience. Would that be possible to arrange?
@Lidsville I saw a list online either this morning or late last night. Can't remember where or who had it though.
Another winner from @bychrischeung; a piece on Kingsgate Mall: https://t.co/hT6SKacDNL
I've read Peter O'Neil's work for many years & only got to know him recently. He's as good a reporter as he is nice. I'm sorry to see him go
It was fun taking a look back with Dave Gerry on his 40-year career in TV. Talented guy; nice guy too: https://t.co/Vr3YawFcV5
Aren't all the same people upset at CTV for firings & switching to Global, the same ones who switched over when they fired people last year?
The great Dave Gerry reflects on a 40-year career in television: https://t.co/Vr3YawWOjF
Half time at Cavalia's Odysseo. It's been quite entertaining so far. #OdysseoYVR
@poneilinOttawa @VancouverSun Sorry to hear this, Peter. All the best.
I'm at lunch and the waiter says highballs are $3...
@davidpball @AndreaWoo Yeah! But also I think we're all learning, the consumer & the journalist and it's good to see evolution if any.
@AndreaWoo Yes, because very often in one's opinion you can see how knowledgeable they are on a subject.
I talked to @docdanielle about her new book Better Now: Six Big Ideas to Improve Health Care for All Canadians: https://t.co/mc1kMwBVbR
I'm sorry to hear about Coleen Christie being let go from CTV. Always a class act at the news desk. https://t.co/lwWfAfynPe
@BreakingChesky Does that mean you won't be on Sundays with @MichelleKOMO anymore?
FDR by Jo Davidson. Roosevelt was born this day in 1882. https://t.co/3mJwvyg7Xc
@jmv Probably not anytime soon. I can't see how one would look good.
eBay sent an email saying they've found a John Adams bust for sale cheaper than I had expected. I'm debating whether to buy it now...
A favourite Lily Tomlin film is the wonderful The Late Show with Art Carney.
As good as Hidden Figures is, I think the SAG award for best cast should've gone to Moonlight, even Captain Fantastic.
@fionamorrow It's a parody account.
People decrying fake news have also retweeted @DenaldJTrumpJr tonight, adding their own commentary not realising itâ€¦ https://t.co/pFIDBzOr9W
@SunCivicLee All the best, Jeff!
And no, I will not be drinking booze from a plastic bottle.
I'm at the local No Frills. I do wish it had a frill or two.
I've been sitting at Manitoba & 1st for the last 15 mins. One guy's come up saying I'll, "never beat us." Whatever the hell that means
I heard Emmanuelle Riva died. Did the husband have anything to do with it? I hope it wasn't anything like in Amour.
Just saw someone with a white cane, looking at their phone. Can we use white canes for texting now?
Such layers to this story. And so many questions still. https://t.co/BhsZjrFXYC
Am I the only one thinking about brunch right now?
The Natalie Clancy report on a paramedic on the front line of the drug crisis is riveting stuff. https://t.co/hIXlhDdHVf
@i_on_food_drink @smh I used rollerballs for years but prefer fountain pens.
I thought HMV had already closed in Canada years ago.
@theArtsClub I'm just following up on a couple of emails I sent Amy on the 10th & 18th requesting an interview. Did they not go through?
Happy birthday, @HowardMortman (Hat tip: Politico's Playbook.)
I knew that second cup of coffee yesterday afternoon was a bad idea.
@JLewisGlobal @GlobalBC Best of luck!
@TheAaronChapman Thanks Aaron; I appreciate it.
@yvrblogger Thank you, Peter.
The funeral for Nestor Planta is tomorrow at 11am at St Patrick's. My uncle was a remarkable guy https://t.co/JQySoOdvdR
@keithbaldrey Millard Fillmore. Ran again in 1856 for the Know Nothing Party.
@keithbaldrey Trivia: What 3 presidents had failed third-party runs after their presidencies?
@BobKronbauer @Lazin_Ryder Did you stop buying pizza from 2007 on? And why?
This is an appropriate and timely tribute to Mary Tyler Moore. https://t.co/P3LwH2P1YZ
What's the consensus on Donald Trump's signature? Hate or like?
@Tintie4 @simisara980 Found this clip: https://t.co/HtCCQ6gMA2 Swoosie Kurtz was on it too. Dave hated this.
@Tintie4 @simisara980 She tried her hand at variety like Carol Burnett and Keaton & Dave were part of the cast. Bombed unfortunately.
@maxfawcett Do you shout out questions as you watch?
@CBCVancouver @AndrewChangCBC @JWagstaffe @BIVnews They look like they're debating each other.
So, if I go to Butchart Gardens, I can't use my selfie stick while dressed in old-timey clothes?
I'm a big fan of @MayorStewart. He's shown great leadership on a number of files.
@Tintie4 @simisara980 It was a rough time. After MTM ended she tried 2 other shows that didn't quite, 1 that had Michael Keaton & Letterman.
@Tintie4 @simisara980 Her son Richard died just after the film came out.
If the fare box is covered in a yellow bag (out of order), I shouldn't have to tap my Compass Card. @TransitPolice?
@astrachanphoto I was hoping for something like We Have a Pope, which even though was amusing was insightful about how the Vatican works.
@astrachanphoto I've always thought critics ought to have their criticism reviewed by other critics, even audiences.
@astrachanphoto I had high hopes, because I thought it would be interesting about the church; and I liked Youth too.
I saw the first episode of The Young Pope. Do I need to watch the others? I feel like I'm not missing much.
@TheImusShow You see this from The Simpsons last week? O'Reilly's Killing Hannity book: https://t.co/fldAy9NMLx
Where my monocle at?
@jenn It is. It's a parody account. I'm CSR at Busters and that's certainly not a sentiment the company has.
@jenn @Busters_Towing @VanMayorsOffice That isn't a real Busters Towing account.
The acclaimed pianist Vicky Choiw is with @musiconmain for @PuShFestival tonight. Here's our chat on her work & more https://t.co/JlxY25Ts2q
In this podcast I refer to Fences as being set in Baltimore. Fences is set in Pittsburgh. I apologise for the errorâ€¦ https://t.co/2rsuLE1LFR
Winston Churchill died this day in 1965. I interviewed biographer Paul Reid about him 4 years ago: https://t.co/Im6ss7zAVk
I finally got around to seeing Captain Fantastic. It's outstanding, Mortensen & the children are wonderful.
The t-bone steak waitress in Hell of High Water, Margaret Bowman ought to be as well known as the chicken salad one in Five Easy Pieces.
Really like seeing Anna Maria Tremonti on @CBCVancouver right now.
Just got off the phone with Danielle Martin. Her new book Better Now is a highly readable, urgent book on healthcare https://t.co/NeUUkaUGs3
I talk to @vcpianos about her appearances @PuShFestival tonight & tomorrow: https://t.co/JlxY25Ts2q
Two P's in a Podcast returns with @jackiepierre & @Planta talking about stuff: https://t.co/8fedOPQb2Z
Was Tuesday Weld born on a Tuesday? Did she have a sister named Wednesday?
A great film performance overlooked in recent weeks is Stephen McKinley Henderson's in Fences.
No one's taken me up on my bet that Ryan Gosling won't get nominated for an Oscar on Tuesday.
Yes, I can't wait for #5. Though it'll be a long one, because he's going to do the whole presidency in one volume.â€¦ https://t.co/BiB3mNYMDA
Emma Thompson's two Oscars were both presented to her by Anthony Hopkins. Rigged!
30 years ago Budd Dwyer shot himself to death on live television. I've never seen the film. It's on youtube if you're inclined.
Legal question: Do the recent presidential pardons have an effect on future sentences for similar crimes i.e. changing legal precedence?
@Garossino I thought so too, but I think she was just following the tradition that Michelle Obama started.
@Garossino Why's the gift meaningless?
Lyndon Johnson died this day in 1973. https://t.co/bjTha57qKd
